What If_

Virtual became reality?

Back

GT Academy

Sponsored by Nissan and PlayStation, more than 830,000 Gran Turismo 5 gamers compete for a shot at becoming a real-life racecar driver. Only the best competitors are selected to move on to the finals, but only one can go pro. It’s one thing to claim victory within the highly competitive world of Gran Turismo, but it takes guts to cross the finish line behind the wheel of an actual racecar
